zone: Ubon Ratchathani (อุบลราชธานี)
circumstances: Shortly after takeoff from Ubon Ratchathani Airport, while climbing, both engines lost power. The captain elected to ditch the aircraft into the Mun River located about two km south of the airfield. All eight crew members were rescued while the aircraft was destroyed.
probable_cause: Loss of engine power during initial climb for unknown reason.
